headline.main: New U. N. Deadlock Perils Move to Delay Debt Issue

byline.original: By THOMAS J. HAMILTON; Special to The New York Times

headline.main: The Proceedings In the U. N.

docs.snippet: Assembly adjourns to Jon 18 without action on unpaid USSR assessments; Thant, in accordance with USSR demand, deletes from closing statement projected appeal for voluntary contributions; authorized to meet expenses until regular budget is adopted;...
docs.lead_paragraph: Assembly adjourns to Jon 18 without action on unpaid USSR assessments; Thant, in accordance with USSR demand, deletes from closing statement projected appeal for voluntary contributions; authorized to meet expenses until regular budget is adopted; Fedorenko says USSR will refuse to pay for some regular budget items estab 'in violation' of Charter
docs.abstract: Assembly adjourns to Jon 18 without action on unpaid USSR assessments; Thant, in accordance with USSR demand, deletes from closing statement projected appeal for voluntary contributions; authorized to meet expenses until regular budget is adopted; Fedorenko says USSR will refuse to pay for some regular budget items estab 'in violation' of Charter

headline.main: U.N. EIS IMPASSE AND TAKES RECESS

byline.original: By THOMAS J. HAMILTON; Special to The New York Times
